data.title: Project Fact Sheet Repository: MassDEP Air Permit Applications
data.meta_description: A listing of project and community information submitted by applicants per the agency's Environmental Justice (EJ) requirements.
data.text:
To help ensure that Massachusetts EJ populations are notified of specific air permit applications with the potential to affect them, and are meaningfully involved in the agency review process, MassDEP directs applicants for certain permits to submit draft two- to four-page Fact Sheets providing details about their proposed projects and neighboring communities.

The Fact Sheets listed on this page are arranged alphabetically by community and applicant name.
